question: The purpose of this survey is to collect widespread information about the living costs of RPI Graduate Students. This survey platform is run by RPI Student Govâ€™t. All responses are anonymous; there is no way to link your responses to your identity after you have submitted this form. The data will be analyzed and reported to the RPI Graduate Community and RPI Administration to better inform the 'basket of goods' model.

This survey is divided into 10 sections: 1. Intro and Demographics 2. Rent and Utilities 3. Food and Groceries 4. Transportation 5. Healthcare 6. Student Loans 7. Technology and Entertainment 8. Personal Care 9. Childcare 10. Conclusion and Final Comments.

While completing this survey, there will be some questions where we ask for a monthly average payment. Ideally, this value would be calculated by summing the amount over the last year and dividing by 12, but we understand there will be some necessary approximations in this calculation. Other questions will ask for a total value over the last 12 months. Please be sure to answer each type of question appropriately with a numeric value rounded to the nearest whole-dollar amount. Furthermore, be sure that you are only counting expenses once. For example, you may feel that one type of expense could be included under either section 7. Technology and Entertainment or 8. Personal Care (e.g. a hobby-related expense like a digital camera). In these scenarios, only include this cost once. It does not matter which category you list the cost under, only that it is not included more than once.

What is your RCSID (examples: 'bhowmd', 'chatts4', etc)? Again, know that this answer is stored separately from your other answers and cannot be used to link you to your other responses in any way. We use your RCSID to improve the integrity of the data we collect in the remainder of this survey.
Are you a domestic or international student?
Which country did you come from?
Which academic year did you start graduate school at RPI?
Do you have any dependents (spouse and/or children)?
This section covers costs associated with Rent and Utilities.
What description best matches your current living situation?
options: Living with family/parents (I am their dependent)
Living with family whom I help support financially

question: How much is your personal contribution for rent each month?
show_if_value: Living with family whom I help support financially

question: How much is your personal contribution for rent each month?
show_if_value: Living with family/parents (I am their dependent)

question: How much is your personal contribution for rent each month?
How much do you pay for rent each month?
How much is your personal contribution for your mortgage payment each month?

How much do you currently pay for Laundry each month?
Would you consider doing your laundry at an RPI facility if it costs less than it does now to do your laundry?
Are there any other expenses which fall into this category? Please list type of cost and average amount paid per month
Please provide any additional comments in this section you feel are necessary.
This section covers costs associated with Food and Groceries.
How much do you pay for groceries each month (this does NOT include take-out or food delivery)? Please provide a monthly average over the last 12 months.
How much do you pay at restaurants (including takeout and food delivery) each month? Please provide a monthly average over the last 12 months.

How much do you pay for food-related service subscriptions each month? Please provide a monthly average over the last 12 months. Examples include: Panera Sip Club, InstaCart, Uber One, Doordash+, Walmart+, meal-prep delivery services, etc.
Are there any other expenses which fall into this category? Please list type of cost and average amount paid per month
Please provide any additional comments in this section you feel are necessary.
This section covers costs associated with Transportation.
Do you own/lease a car?
How much do you pay for gas each month? Please provide a monthly average over the last 12 months.
How much do you pay for automobile insurance each month? Please provide a monthly average over the last 12 months.
How much do you pay for your car loan each month? Please provide a monthly average over the last 12 months.
How much, in total, did you pay for parking over the last 12 months?
How much, in total, did you pay for other car-related expenses over the last 12 months?
How much do you pay for alternative transport services per month? This includes CDTA, Uber, Lyft, Amtrak, Greyhound, etc. Please provide a monthly average over the last 12 months.
Are there any other expenses which fall into this category? Please list type of cost and average amount paid per month
Please provide any additional comments in this section you feel are necessary.
This section covers costs associated with Healthcare.
Do you get health insurance directly from RPI? The current provider is â€˜MVP Healthâ€™.

This section covers costs associated with Technology and Entertainment.

How much do you pay for Subscriptions each month? Please provide a monthly average over the last 12 months. Examples include: Streaming Services, AI Apps, Cloud Services, Other Software, Game Pass, etc.
How much do you pay for phone-related expenses each month? Please provide a monthly average over the last 12 months. Includes Installment Plans and service/Data Plans.
How much, in total, have you spent on large electronics purchases over the last 12 months? Includes Laptops, Monitors, Phones, Other Accessories, etc.
How much, in total, have you spent on large household appliances over the last 12 months? Includes Kitchen Appliances, Furniture, ACs, Vacuums, Luggage, etc.
Are there any other expenses which fall into this category? Please list type of cost and average amount paid per month
Please provide any additional comments in this section you feel are necessary.
This section covers costs associated with Personal Care.
How much, in total, have you spent on Clothing over the last 12 months?
How much, in total, have you spent on Beauty, Health & Personal Care over the last 12 months? Includes Haircuts, Hair Styling, Skincare, Beauty Products, etc.

How much, in total, have you spent on hobby related expenses over the last 12 months? Includes Materials, Equipment, Passes related to Hobbies like Hiking, Skiing, Photography, Reading, Crocheting, etc.
Are there any other expenses which fall into this category? Please list type of cost and average amount paid per month

This section covers costs associated with family finances and/or childcare.
How many dependents do you have?
Do you have a spouse/partner helping to cover monthly costs?
My spouse/partner earns...

Please tell us about any other childcare/family expenses you think are relevant but are not covered in the other sections of this survey.
Please provide any additional comments in this section you feel are necessary.
This is the final section.
Which of the following most closely describes your methodology for completing this survey?
options: I rigorously back-calculated all of my expenses for the last year
I gave rough estimates of my monthly expenses
I guessed at what I spend each month for some categories

question: Please feel free to provide any feedback on this survey.
Thank you for completing this survey! Please share it with your friends. We want as many graduate students to complete it as possible.
